description: "Although quite detailed for an early 17th century map of Asia, there are some inaccuracies in the representation of the islands of Southeast Asia, particularly Java (labelled 'Iaua maior'), Borneo (Burne), Sulawesi (Celebes) and the Maluku Islands."
title: "Asia ex magna orbis terre descriptione Gerardi Mercatoris desumpta, studio et industria G.M. Iunioris"
